titles.title: Peace, bring it all to peace The storms surrounding me

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Peace, bring it all to peace The storms surrounding me
Let it break at Your name
Still, call the sea to still, The rage in me to still
Every wave at Your name

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Jesus, Jesus, You make the darkness tremble
Jesus, Jesus, You silence fear
Jesus, Jesus, You make the darkness tremble
Jesus, Jesus

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Breathe, call these bones to leave Call these lungs to sing
Once again, I will praise
Breathe, call these bones to leave Call these lungs to sing
Once again, I will praise

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Your name is a light that the shadows can't deny
Your name can-not be over-come
Your name is alive for-ever lifted high
Your name can-not be over-come
